content:
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2022-05+Clinical+Reasoning
Can this page be updated with Questionnaire testing and PlanDefinition use cases as noted in the CPG on FHIR call: 2022-03-16 - CPG-on-FHIR/Informatics Stream Subworkgroup

Suggested Questionnaire + PD use cases include:

ASBI: https://github.com/asbi-cds-tools
Cervical Cancer: https://github.com/ccsm-cds-tools/ccsm-cds-with-tests (questionnaire is still a draft)
WHO ANC: https://build.fhir.org/ig/WorldHealthOrganization/smart-anc/artifacts.html (multiple questionnaires)
CDC Opioid + CDS4CPM: https://build.fhir.org/ig/cqframework/opioid-cds-r4/artifacts.html (I can't find the questionnaire for this use case)
NACHC HIV
OHSU HTN https://build.fhir.org/ig/OHSUCMP/htnu18ig/artifacts.html (I can't find the questionnaire for this use case)
Lung Cancer Screening

I left the above comment on this confluence page. Are there other applicable use cases that might make sense for May 2022 Connectathon? @Rob Reynolds @Bryn Rhodes @David Winters
We're planning on attending and would like to support the cervical cancer use case.
@David Winters I noticed in CCSM you have the start of a questionnaire. Are you going to be adding more or just focusing on PlanDefinition and CQL logic?
We're focused on Questionnaires + PDs and ASBI seems like the best example we have of that so that's only focus right now, but we'd like to add more
We can do ASBI too if there is time. There is going to be a questionnaire in place by May for CCSM.
@Alex Goel, confluence page is updated with those links, thank you!
